page.title: 15School Trip,Bradford(cont.)
page.content: Suddenly it was dinnertime.I was hungry and hot,so I sat under a tree and ate my dinner.Afterwards I went to the toilet and the present shop,but I didn't buy anything because I went to the toilet first and forgot about the gift shop.After that we played some more and then it was time to come home.I was sleepy on the coach and wanted to go to sleep but Ben kept tickling me and moving about.When we got back to school it was home time so I went up to my Grandma's and told her all about the trip.I hadn't told her where I was going because I thought she already knew so I sat down last night and told her.I really liked my trip.
